options.text: Remote marketing teams using Asana, 20-50 people
options.why: Focuses on Asana's user base for optimized task management.

options.text: Design agencies with 50-100 employees using Adobe Suite
options.why: Caters to large teams needing creative workflow efficiency.

options.text: Small startups (5-20 people) using Trello for project tracking
options.why: Addresses needs of growing teams for agile project management.
